Name: Fused Armor
Description: Extra DMG Reduction decreases by 50% when taking DMG from Tank Omniframes.

Name: Deterioration
Description: When the enemy deals DMG, the healing received by the target is reduced by 50% for 3s.

Name: Lightning Shield
Description: Every time the enemy gets hit, has a 10% chance to call down a lightning strike upon the attacker, dealing Lightning DMG equal to 20% of its ATK.

Name: Lone Wolf
Description: If there are fewer than 3 companions around the enemy, its Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10% (up to 30%) for each companion lost.

Name: Commander II
Description: The enemy's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10% for each companion around. Stacks up to 3 times.

Name: Penetration III
Description: The enemy will reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction by 5% when dealing DMG. Stacks up to 10 times. Each stack lasts 10s.

Name: Radiation I
Description: The enemy will deal Physical DMG equal to 1% of its ATK to nearby targets per second.

Name: Radiation II
Description: The enemy will deal Physical DMG equal to 2% of its ATK to nearby targets per second.

Name: Radiation III
Description: The enemy will deal Physical DMG equal to 3% of its ATK to nearby targets per second.

Name: Berserk I
Description: The enemy's attacking desire increases by 33%. When dealing DMG, has a 20% chance to deal 33% Extra DMG.

Name: Berserk II
Description: The enemy's attacking desire increases by 66%. When dealing DMG, has a 40% chance to deal 33% Extra DMG.

Name: Berserk III
Description: The enemy's attacking desire increases by 100%. When dealing DMG, has a 60% chance to deal 33% Extra DMG.

Description: The enemy will recover 1% of max HP per second.

Name: Recovery II
Description: The enemy will recover 2% of max HP per second.

Name: Recovery III
Description: The enemy will recover 3% of max HP per second.

Name: Attack Boost II
Description: The enemy's ATK increases by 20%.

Name: Attack Boost III
Description: The enemy's ATK increases by 30%.

Name: Flash
Description: The enemy will teleport toward the target every 10s.

Name: Black Hole II
Description: The enemy will pull the player in every 12s.

Name: Black Hole

Name: Freeze II
Description: Each enemy attack has a 60% chance to deal an additional 10% Ice DMG and freeze the target for 1s.

Name: Bomb
Description: The enemy will explode and deal Physical DMG equal to 45% of its ATK to nearby units before it dies.

Name: Bomb
Description: The enemy will explode and deal Physical DMG equal to 45% of its ATK to nearby units before it dies.

Name: Backfire III
Description: The enemy will generate an energy shield that deals 10% Physical DMG to the attackers. Lasts 3s. 16s cooldown.

Name: Barrier
Description: Receives a permanent shield equal to 15% of current HP. Becomes immune to attacks while the shield is active. Removes the shield after taking a certain amount of damage. It will reactivate in 15s.

Name: Barrier
Description: Receives a permanent shield equal to 25% of current HP. Becomes immune to attacks while the shield is active. Removes the shield after taking a certain amount of damage. It will reactivate in 15s.

Description: The enemy's Extra DMG Reduction increases by 30% when taking DMG farther than 4m.

Name: Agile
Description: Increases 5%-40% movement speed. The farther away from the target, the faster the movement speed

Description: Increases 20%-35% movement speed. The farther away from the target, the faster the movement speed

Name: Immovable
Description: Immune to hit and control effects.

Name: Recovery
Description: Recovers 1% of max HP per second.

Name: Recovery
Description: Recovers 2% of max HP per second.

Name: Recovery
Description: Recovers 3% of max HP per second.

Name: Shield
Description: Gains a shield with capacity equal to 5% of current HP every 10s. The shield lasts 10s.

Name: Shield
Description: Gains a shield with capacity equal to 10% of current HP every 10s. The shield lasts 10s.

Name: Shield
Description: Gains a shield with capacity equal to 15% of current HP every 10s. The shield lasts 10s.

Name: Berserk
Description: Increases ATK frequency by 33%, having a 20% of chance to deal 33% Extra Physical DMG.

Name: Berserk
Description: Increases ATK frequency by 66%, having a 40% of chance to deal 33% Extra Physical DMG.

Description: Increases ATK frequency by 100%, having a 60% of chance to deal 33% Extra Physical DMG.

Name: Bomb
Description: Leaves a bomb upon death that deals 45% Physical DMG.

Name: Bomb
Description: Leaves a bomb upon death that deals 45% Physical DMG.

Name: Bomb
Description: Leaves a bomb upon death that deals 45% Physical DMG.

Name: Rigid Body
Description: Only takes 1 damage from incoming attacks. This effect is removed after taking damage 6 times, and resumes 8s later.

Name: Rigid Body
Description: Only takes 1 damage from incoming attacks. This effect is removed after taking damage 9 times, and resumes 8s later.

Name: Rigid Body
Description: Only takes 1 damage from incoming attacks. This effect is removed after taking damage 12 times, and resumes 8s later.

Name: Barrier
Description: Receives a permanent shield equal to 15% of current HP. Becomes immune to attacks while the shield is active. After taking a certain amount of DMG, the shield will be removed.

Name: Barrier
Description: Receives a permanent shield equal to 25% of current HP. Becomes immune to attacks while the shield is active. After taking a certain amount of DMG, the shield will be removed.

Name: Barrier
Description: Receives a permanent shield equal to 35% of current HP. Becomes immune to attacks while the shield is active. After taking a certain amount of DMG, the shield will be removed.

Name: Radiation
Description: Continuously deals 1% Physical DMG to nearby enemies.

Name: Radiation
Description: Continuously deals 2% Physical DMG to nearby enemies.

Name: Radiation
Description: Continuously deals 3% Physical DMG to nearby enemies.

Name: Closed Loop
Description: Increases Extra DMG Reduction by 30% against long-ranged attacks.

Name: Closed Loop
Description: Increases Extra DMG Reduction by 45% against long-ranged attacks.

Name: Closed Loop
Description: Increases Extra DMG Reduction by 60% against long-ranged attacks.

Name: Blessing
Description: Increases Extra DMG Bonus of allies nearby by 20%

Name: Blessing
Description: Increases Extra DMG Bonus of allies nearby by 20%

Name: Blessing
Description: Increases Extra DMG Bonus of allies nearby by 20%

Name: Lone Wolf
Description: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 10%. Stacks up to 3 times. When there are less than 3 allies nearby, the fewer the allies, the more stacks will be granted.

Name: Lone Wolf
Description: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 4.5%. Stacks up to 10 times on the fewer number of nearby allies.

Name: Lone Wolf
Description: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 6%. Stacks up to 10 times. The less the allies nearby, the higher the stacks.

Name: Commander
Description: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 5%. The more allies nearby, the more stacks will be granted.

Name: Commander
Description: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 10%. The more allies nearby, the more stacks will be granted.

Name: Commander
Description: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 15%. The more allies nearby, the more stacks will be granted.

Name: Penetration
Description: Dealing DMG will reduce the target's DEF by 3%. Stacks up to 10 times. Each stack lasts 10s.

Name: Penetration
Description: Dealing DMG will reduce the target's DEF by 4%. Stacks up to 10 times. Each stack lasts 10s.

Name: Penetration
Description: Dealing DMG will reduce the target's DEF by 5%. Stacks up to 10 times. Each stack lasts 10s.

Name: Lightning Shield
Description: When attacked, has a 10% chance to cast a lightning strike at the attacker's location, dealing 20% Lightning DMG. 5s cooldown.

Name: Lightning Shield
Description: When attacked, has a 15%-25% chance to cast a lightning strike at the attacker's location, dealing 25% Lightning DMG. 2.5s cooldown. The farther from the target, the higher chance it will be triggered.

Name: Lightning Shield
Description: When attacked, has a 15%-25% chance to cast a lightning strike at the attacker's location, dealing 30% Lightning DMG. 2s cooldown. The farther from the target, the higher chance it will be triggered.

Name: Wave
Description: Creates a shockwave upon getting up, repelling nearby enemies. Cooldown: 18s.

Name: Wave
Description: Creates a shockwave upon getting up, repelling nearby enemies. Cooldown: 14s.

Name: Wave
Description: Creates a shockwave upon getting up, repelling nearby enemies. Cooldown: 10s.

Name: Lightning Mine
Description: When attacking, leaves a bomb that deals 15% Physical DMG on the target.

Name: Lightning Mine
Description: When attacking, leaves a bomb that deals 15% Physical DMG on the target.

Name: Lightning Mine
Description: When attacking, leaves a bomb that deals 15% Physical DMG on the target.

Name: Invisibility
Description: When visible, you will gain invisibility after 3s. If you are hit, you'll become visible.

Name: Invisibility
Description: You can switch to invisibility 3s later if you are visible now. And when you are hit, you will be visible again for 3s

Name: Invisibility
Description: You can switch to invisibility 1s later if you are visible now. And when you are hit, you will be visible again for 3s

Name: Flash
Description: Teleports near the target when they are far away. 10s cooldown.

Name: Flash
Description: When you are far away from the target, transfers you close to the target, CD for 7-9s. The farther the transfer distance, the shorter the CD

Name: Flash
Description: Teleports near the target when they are far away. 6-8s cooldown. The farther the teleport distance, the shorter the cooldown will become.

Name: Transfer
Description: Teleports away when close to the target. 8s cooldown. Has a 30% chance to trigger the effect when taking DMG. Cooldowns are calculated separately.

Name: Transfer
Description: Teleports away when close to the target. 7s cooldown. Has a 30% chance to trigger the effect when taking DMG. Cooldowns are calculated separately.

Name: Transfer
Description: Teleports away when close to the target. Has a cooldown of 6 seconds. Has a 30% chance to trigger the effect when taking DMG. Cooldowns are calculated separately.

Name: Division
Description: Summons two Clones of the same type that inherit 30% ATK and DEF upon dying.

Name: Division
Description: Summons two Clones of the same type that inherit 60% ATK and DEF upon dying.

Name: Division
Description: Summons two Clones of the same type that inherit 100% ATK and DEF upon dying.

Name: Black Hole
Description: Every 16s, casts a black hole with weak gravitational pull at the current location.

Name: Black Hole
Description: Every 12s, leaves a black hole with moderate gravitational pull at your location.

Name: Black Hole
Description: Every 8s, casts a black hole with strong gravitational pull at your location.

Name: Laser
Description: Casts lasers that can deal 3% continuous Physical Damage to the eight main directions every once in a while.

Name: Laser
Description: Casts lasers that can deal 4% continuous Physical Damage to the eight main directions every once in a while.

Name: Laser
Description: Casts lasers that can deal 5% continuous Physical Damage to the eight main directions every once in a while.

Name: Flame
Description: Attacks deal an additional 10% Fire DMG and have a 10% of chance to inflict Burn, dealing 10% of Fire DMG per second for 3s.

Name: Flame
Description: Attacks deal an additional 15% Fire DMG and have a 15% of chance to inflict Burn, dealing 15% of Fire DMG per second for 3s.

Name: Flame
Description: Attacks deal an additional 20% Fire DMG and have a 20% of chance to inflict Burn, dealing 20% of Fire DMG per second for 3s.

Name: Freeze
Description: Attacks have a 30% chance to deal an additional 10% Ice DMG and freeze the target for 1s.

Name: Freeze
Description: Attacks have a 60% chance to deal an additional 10% Ice DMG and freeze the target for 1s.

Name: Freeze
Description: Attacks have a 100% chance to deal an additional 10% Ice DMG and freeze the target for 1s.

Name: Shadow
Description: Attacks deal an additional 10% Dark DMG with a 10% chance to stun the target for 0.5s and deal 10% extra Dark DMG.

Name: Shadow
Description: Attacks deal an additional 15% Dark DMG with a 15% chance to stun the target for 0.7s and deal 15% extra Dark DMG.

Name: Shadow
Description: Attacks deal an additional 20% Dark DMG with a 20% chance to stun the target for 0.9s and deal 20% extra Dark DMG.

Name: Thunderous
Description: Attacks deal an additional 10% Lightning DMG and have a 10% chance for Channeling, and casts lightning once to the target every 1.5s for 1.5s.

Name: Thunderous
Description: Attacks deal an additional 15% Lightning DMG and have a 15% chance for Channeling, and casts lightning once to the target every 1.5s for 3s.

Name: Thunderous
Description: Attacks deal an additional 20% Lightning DMG and have a 20% chance for Channeling, and casts lightning once to the target every 1.5s for 4.5s.

Name: Cold Trail
Description: Unleashes an Ice Block to keep tracing the target, dealing 500 Ice DMG when the Ice Block contacts the target. The farther away from the target, the faster the movement speed.

Name: Cold Trail
Description: Unleashes an Ice Block to keep tracing the target, dealing 10% Ice DMG when the Ice Block contacts the target. The farther away from the target, the faster the movement speed.

Name: Cold Trail
Description: Unleashes an Ice Block to keep tracing the target, dealing 15% Ice DMG when the Ice Block contacts the target. The farther away from the target, the faster the movement speed.

Name: Deterioration
Description: Damage dealt also reduces target's healing received by 30% for 3s.

Name: Deterioration
Description: Damage dealt also reduces target's healing received by 45% for 4s.

Name: Deterioration
Description: Damage dealt also reduces target's healing received by 60% for 5s.

Name: Null Heal
Description: Periodically makes the target unable to receive any healing effects for 3s.

Name: Null Heal
Description: Periodically makes the target unable to receive any healing effects for 4s.

Name: Null Heal
Description: Periodically makes the target unable to receive any healing effects for 5s.

Name: Imprison
Description: Creates a barrier at the target location that lasts for 3s, blocking targets from entering or leaving. 15s cooldown.

Name: Imprison
Description: Creates a barrier at the target location that lasts for 4s, blocking targets from entering or leaving. 16s cooldown.

Name: Imprison
Description: Creates a barrier at the target location that lasts for 5s, blocking targets from entering or leaving. 17s cooldown.

Name: Invasion
Description: When dealing DMG, also deals 2% Physical DMG to the target every second and triggers other effects of Damage Affix for 3s.

Name: Invasion
Description: When dealing DMG, also deals 2% Physical DMG to the target every second and triggers other effects of Damage Affix for 4s.

Name: Invasion
Description: When dealing DMG, also deals 2% Physical DMG to the target every second and triggers other effects of Damage Affix for 5s.

Name: Backfire
Description: Generates an energy shield that deals 15% Physical DMG to the attackers. Lasts 3s. 16s cooldown.

Name: Backfire
Description: Generates an energy shield for 4s that deals 25% Physical DMG to targets. 17s cooldown.

Name: Backfire
Description: Generates an energy shield for 5s that deals 35% Physical DMG to targets. 18s cooldown.

Name: Fire Vulnerability III
Description: Fire Resistance decreases by 60%.

Name: Berserk III
Description: Increases Attack Desire by 100%, having a 40% chance to deal 33% Extra Physical Damage.

Name: Barrier II
Description: Gets a permanent shield equal to 25% of current HP. Becomes immune to attacks while the shield is active. Removes the shield after taking a certain amount of damage. It'll reactivate in 15s.

Name: Random Vulnerable Orb Color
Description: The orb color that your character is vulnerable to changes every 30s (lasts 15s). The damage taken from the orbs of the corresponding color decreases by 30%.

Name: Fragility Vulnerability
Description: After receiving 400k/500k/600k/700k damage during the Fragility status, the character will be immobilized for 5s and gain 20%/30%/40%/50% permanent Vulnerability.

Name: Random Vulnerable Orb Color II
Description: The orb color that your character is vulnerable to changes every 30s (lasts 15s). The damage taken from the orbs of the corresponding color decreases by 60%.

Name: Penetration III
Description: Dealing DMG will reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction by 5%. Stacks up to 10 times. Each stack lasts 10s.

Name: Fate
Description: Extra DMG Reduction against Kamui's hits decreases by 30%.

Name: Frost Shield
Description: Reduces DMG taken by 30%. When receiving Basic Attacks, the attacker's movement speed decreases by 50% for 2s.

Name: Flame Shield
Description: The sphere burner will inflict continuous DMG equal to 20% of self ATK on the enemy it touches. Half of DMG dealt will be converted to HP.

Name: Shadow Shield
Description: When HP drops by more than 20%, creates a shield equal to 10% of max HP for 5s. When it disappears, it will explode and deal damage within 8m.

Name: Lethal
Description: When the attack hits its target, the target has a 50% chance to lose additional 50% HP or recover 20% HP.

Name: Drain
Description: Attacks will restore 10% of self-HP.

Name: First-aid
Description: Activated when HP drops to 10% and restores 20% HP after 5s

Name: Soul Devourer
Description: Increases ATK by 20% for each dead ally.

Name: Super Assault
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%. Can be stacked up to 20 times.

Name: Super Rigid Body
Description: Takes 1 DMG only from incoming attacks. This effect is removed after taking DMG 100 times, and is resumed 10s later.

Name: Bleed
Description: Takes DMG according to max HP once per second.

Name: Grave Wounds
Description: When HP drops below 90%, receives DMG at regular intervals until HP is restored to more than 90%.

Name: Dominator
Description: Immune to Matrix and limiting effects of Signature Moves

Name: Vanguard Enhanced
Description: Vanguard gains an additional 20% ATK.

Name: Reruns
Description: 15 Reruns Owned

Name: Reruns
Description: 8 Reruns Owned

Name: Reruns
Description: 5 Reruns Owned

Name: Reruns
Description: 3 Reruns Owned

Name: HP Up
Description: Enemies' HP decreases by 50%.

Name: HP Up
Description: Enemies' HP does not change.

Name: HP Up
Description: Enemies' HP increases by 70%.

Name: HP Up
Description: Enemies' HP increases by 120%.

Name: ATK Up
Description: Enemies' ATK decreases by 30%.

Name: ATK Up
Description: Enemies' ATK does not change.

Name: ATK Up
Description: Enemies' ATK increases by 70%.

Name: ATK Up
Description: Enemies' ATK increases by 150%.

Name: Rerun I
Description: 15 Reruns Owned.

Name: Rerun II
Description: 8 Reruns Owned.

Name: Rerun III
Description: 5 Reruns owned. Commandant, you are recommended to upgrade Truth Unveil before challenging again.

Name: Rerun IV
Description: 3 Reruns owned. Commandant, you are recommended to upgrade Truth Unveil before challenging again.

Name: Exhausted III
Description: Enemy HP -90%

Name: Exhausted II
Description: Enemy HP -75%

Name: Exhausted I
Description: Enemy HP -50%

Name: HP
Description: Enemy HP remains normal.

Name: Weakened II
Description: Enemies' ATK decreases by 65%

Name: Weakened I
Description: Enemies' ATK decreases by 30%

Name: ATK
Description: Enemy ATK remains normal.

Name: ATK Boost I
Description: Enemy ATK +70%

Name: Berserk I
Description: The enemy's attacking desire increases by 33%. When dealing DMG, has a 20% chance to deal 33% Extra DMG.

Name: Berserk II
Description: The enemy's attacking desire increases by 66%. When dealing DMG, has a 40% chance to deal 33% Extra DMG.

Name: Black Hole II
Description: Periodically leaves a black hole with moderate gravitational pull at your location.

Name: Weak Point 1
Description: Refresh a random weak point. Destroy the weak point to deal massive True DMG

Name: Weak Point 2
Description: Enemies will have 4 weak points that disappear in 4.5s and refresh 2s after that. Destroy all weak points to reduce the enemies' DMG Immunity by 20% for 20s

Name: Bleed
Description: The character will bleed and take damage over time when staying too long on the battlefield

Name: Defense Boost
Description: The character's Extra DMG Reduction increases by 50%

Name: Devour Wave
Description: 1. <color=#0e70bd>40/70/100/120s</color> after entering the level, a <color=#0e70bd>Devour Wave</color> will appear.\n2. While in the Devour Wave, <color=#0e70bd>5s will be deducted</color> (triggers every <color=#0e70bd>5s</color>).

Name: Devour Wave II
Description: 1. <color=#0e70bd>40/70/100/120s</color> after entering the level, a massive <color=#0e70bd>Devour Wave</color> will appear.\n2. While in the Devour Wave, <color=#0e70bd>5s will be deducted</color> (triggers every <color=#0e70bd>5s</color>).

Name: Devour Wave
Description: 1. <color=#0e70bd>40/70/100/120s</color> after entering the level, a <color=#0e70bd>Devour Wave</color> will appear.\n2. While in the Devour Wave, <color=#0e70bd>5s will be deducted</color> (triggers every <color=#0e70bd>5s</color>).

Name: Devour Wave II
Description: 1. <color=#0e70bd>40/70/100/120s</color> after entering the level, a massive <color=#0e70bd>Devour Wave</color> will appear.\n2. While in the Devour Wave, <color=#0e70bd>5s will be deducted</color> (triggers every <color=#0e70bd>5s</color>).

Name: Breezes
Description: 1. The direction of a Breeze will be indicated <color=#0e70bd>3s</color> before it begins to blow. After which, the Breeze wiill blow for <color=#0e70bd>2s</color>.\n2. The Breeze will trigger <color=#0e70bd>Candle Light</color>, <color=#0e70bd>Condensing Tides</color> and <color=#0e70bd>Halting Lasers</color>.

Name: Frail Obstacles
Description: 1. Whenever a <color=#0e70bd>barrier</color> appears, be sure to <color=#0e70bd>destroy</color> it ASAP.

Name: Candle Light
Description: 1. Explodes <color=#0e70bd>8s</color> after spawning. Be sure to <color=#0e70bd>destroy it ASAP</color>.\n2. The explosion causes <color=#0e70bd>Knockback</color> and <color=#0e70bd>deducts 10s</color>.

Name: Candle Light II
Description: 1. Explodes <color=#0e70bd>6s</color> after spawning. Be sure to <color=#0e70bd>destroy it ASAP</color>.\n2. The explosion causes <color=#0e70bd>Knockback</color> and <color=#0e70bd>deducts 10s</color>.

Name: Condensing Tides
Description: 1. Divides <color=#0e70bd>8s</color> after spawning. Be sure to <color=#0e70bd>destroy it ASAP</color>.\n2. After dividing, it creates a 3*3 <color=#0e70bd>Devour Wave</color> on the ground.

Name: Condensing Tides II
Description: 1. Divides <color=#0e70bd>6s</color> after spawning. Be sure to <color=#0e70bd>destroy it ASAP</color>.\n2. After dividing, it creates a 3x3 <color=#0e70bd>Devour Wave</color> on the ground.

Name: Halting Lasers
Description: 1. After an <color=#0e70bd>8s</color> warning, fires a laser beam in a straight line.\n2 After firing, deals DMG and <color=#0e70bd>deducts 10s</color>.

Name: Halting Lasers II
Description: 1. After an <color=#0e70bd>6s</color> warning, fires a laser beam in a straight line.\n2 After firing, deals DMG and <color=#0e70bd>deducts 10s</color>.

Name: Team Lock-On
Description: 1. Team members can only be selected <color=#0e70bd>at the start of each challenge attempt</color>. After which, team composition cannot be altered.\n2. After completing a level, <color=#0e70bd>team HP</color> and <color=#0e70bd> Signature Energy</color> will be maintained.

Name: Space Recovery II
Description: 1. Gain a 90-second remaining time bonus after clearing it successfully.

Name: Space Recovery I
Description: 1. Gain a 70-second remaining time bonus after clearing it successfully.

Name: Enemy Enhancement I
Description: 1. All enemy units' basic stats get enhanced. 3-man team with an average of 6000 Battle Power recommended.

Name: Data Recovery
Description: Switching characters will restore 1 random set of Signal Orbs.

Name: Sunder Armor
Description: Physical Resistance decreases by 40%.

Name: Pyrophobia
Description: Fire Resistance decreases by 40%.

Name: Astraphobia
Description: Lightning Resistance decreases by 40%.

Name: Cryophobia
Description: Ice Resistance - 40%

Name: Nyctophobia
Description: Dark Resistance decreases by 40%.

Name: Stop thinking
Description: In the Matrix, Finisher Gauge reduction increased by 20%

Name: Expedition Security I
Description: We have to protect the Base! Upon result calculation, <color=#0e70bd>the higher HP of the Base</color>, the <color=#0e70bd>more Guild Points</color> will be rewarded, up to <color=#0e70bd>19,000 points</color>.

Name: Ambusher Killer
Description: (Not activated) For every 33% of the progress, <color=#0e70bd>1 Ambusher closest to the base with the highest HP will be removed</color>. The Ambusher refresh interval will be refreshed to 24h.

Name: Ambusher Killer I
Description: For every 33% of the progress, <color=#0e70bd>1 Ambusher closest to the base with the highest HP will be removed</color>. The Ambusher refresh interval will be refreshed to 24h.

Name: Ambusher Killer II
Description: For every 33% of the progress, <color=#0e70bd>1 Ambusher closest to the base with the highest HP will be removed</color>. The Ambusher refresh interval will be refreshed to 24h.

Name: Ambusher Killer III
Description: Success! <color=#0e70bd>1 Ambusher closest to the base with the highest HP will be removed</color>. The Ambusher refresh interval will be refreshed to 24h.

Name: Ambusher Terminator
Description: (Not activated) For every 33% of the progress, <color=#0e70bd>2 Ambushers closest to the base with the highest HP will be removed</color>. The Ambusher refresh interval will be refreshed to 48h.

Name: Ambusher Terminator I
Description: For every 33% of the progress, <color=#0e70bd>2 Ambushers closest to the base with the highest HP will be removed</color>. The Ambusher refresh interval will be refreshed to 48h.

Name: Ambusher Terminator II
Description: For every 33% of the progress, <color=#0e70bd>2 Ambushers closest to the base with the highest HP will be removed</color>. The Ambusher refresh interval will be refreshed to 48h.

Name: Ambusher Terminator III
Description: Success! <color=#0e70bd>2 Ambushers closest to the base with the highest HP will be removed</color>. The Ambusher refresh interval will be refreshed to 48h.

Name: Uniframe Area
Description: Enemies have 30% less Physical Resistance. Upon casting the Signature Move, characters start dealing 40% more Physical DMG.

Name: Dark Pass
Description: <color=#A52A2A>Beat the Fire Pass to remove the Invincibility status of the Dangerous Cliff</color>. Dark Pass enemies have <color=#0e70bd>30%</color> less Dark Resistance. You're suggested to deploy dark members.

Name: Steel Courage
Description: After the merging, Steel Tango will use the special ability to <color=#36b2fc>restore 10% of Max HP to all Ambushers!</color>

Name: Physical Pass
Description: <color=#A52A2A>Beat the Fire Pass to remove the Invincibility status of the Dangerous Cliff</color>. Physical Pass enemies have <color=#0e70bd>30%</color> less Physical Resistance. You're suggested to deploy physical members.

Name: Uniframe Pass
Description: <color=#A52A2A>Upon destruction, Dangerous Cliff is no longer Invincible</color>. Uniframe Pass reduces enemies' Lightning Resistance by <color=#0e70bd>30%</color>. Enemies can now be executed.

Name: Lightning Resistance Down
Description: Enemies' Lightning Resistance decreases by 30%.

Name: Signature Move Boost
Description: Upon casting the Signature Move, starts dealing 40% more Physical DMG for 5s.

Name: Physical Resistance Down
Description: Enemies' Physical Resistance decreases by 30%.

Name: Phantom Amplification
Description: For every character or phantom on the field, characters on the field deal 10% more Dark DMG, stacking up to 7 times and lasting 3s.

Name: Dark Resistance Down
Description: Enemies' Dark Resistance decreases by 30%.

Name: Single Overclock
Description: Dealing more than 100k Lightning DMG with a single hit restores 3 Signal Orbs of the same random color. This effect has an 8s cooldown.

Name: Special Operation Character
Description: Use the special operation character to clear the stage faster!

Name: TBD
Description: TBD

Name: Data Recovery
Description: Recovers a set of random Signal Orbs after casting Signature Move.

Name: DMG Up
Description: Upon matching a 3-Ping, for 5s, casting a Signature Move inflicts a 50% DMG Up effect on its target for 4s.

Name: Assassin I
Description: <color=#0e70bd>Removes 1 Ambusher</color> when triggered.

Name: Assassin II
Description: When triggered, <color=#0e70bd>removes 1 Ambusher</color> with 2 Ambushers removed in total.

Name: Assassin III
Description: When triggered, <color=#0e70bd>removes 1 Ambusher and extends the Ambusher refresh interval to 24h</color>, with 3 Ambushers removed in total.

Name: Termination I
Description: <color=#0e70bd>Removes 2 Ambushers</color> when triggered.

Name: Termination II
Description: When triggered, <color=#0e70bd>removes 2 Ambushers</color> with 4 Ambushers removed in total.

Name: Termination III
Description: When triggered, <color=#0e70bd>removes 2 Ambushers and extends the Ambusher refresh interval to 48h</color>, with 6 Ambushers removed in total.

Name: Expedition Operation I
Description: Dark DMG increases by 15%.

Name: Expedition Operation II
Description: Dark DMG increases by 30%.

Name: Operation Thunder
Description: On this Expedition, Lightning characters will surely outperform themselves. You should make the most of them.

Name: Outpost Boost I
Description: On this difficulty level, there are more Outposts. Proceed with caution.

Name: Outpost Boost II
Description: On this difficulty level, there are significantly more Outposts. Proceed with caution.

Name: Expedition Security II
Description: Protect the base! During result calculation, <color=#0e70bd>the higher the Base HP</color>, <color=#0e70bd>the more Guild Points</color> you'll get, up to <color=#0e70bd>100,000 Points</color>.

Name: Expedition Security III
Description: Protect the base! During result calculation, <color=#0e70bd>the higher the Base HP</color>, <color=#0e70bd>the more Guild Points</color> you'll get, up to <color=#0e70bd>340,000 Points</color>.

Name: Route Blocking I
Description: Cliff Fortress during the expedition. Clear it to move on.

Name: Route Blocking II
Description: Cliff Fortress II during the expedition. Clear it to move on.

Name: Paradox Recovery
Description: Once killed, the Moon Eater will be revived with a higher level!

Name: Enhanced Boss
Description: The Moon Eater has enhanced stats in this difficulty level. It takes more guild members to defeat the Moon Eater.

Name: Surge of Energy
Description: Breaking the Moon Eater's <color=#35aff8>Super Armor</color> will restore 3 sets of Signal Orbs to all members for 6s.

Name: Fluctuation of Violence
Description: Breaking the Moon Eater's <color=#35aff8>Super Armor</color> will restore Signature Energy to all members for 6s.

Name: Matrix Outburst
Description: Kill an enemy or break their <color=#0e70bd>Super Armor</color> to enter the Matrix.

Name: Enhanced Frame
Description: Breaking the Moon Eater's <color=#0e70bd>Super Armor</color> will enhance all members for 6s.

Name: Shield Wall
Description: Reduces DMG from the front by up to 50%.

Name: Messenger of the Last Words
Description: Grants 30% DMG and HP to all allies upon death

Name: Dynamic Calibration
Description: Restores 1% of max HP every second. The restoration effect drops from 1% to 0.4% during the 2s after the character receives damage.

Name: Dynamic Calibration
Description: Restores 2% of max HP every second. The restoration effect drops from 2% to 0.8% during the 2s after the character receives damage.

Name: Dynamic Calibration
Description: Restores 3% of max HP every second. The restoration effect drops from 3% to 1.2% during the 2s after the character receives damage.

Name: The Leader
Description: Gains the Commander and Blessing effects and 50% higher max HP.

Name: Physical Endurance
Description: Physical Resistance increases by 30%.

Name: Physical Endurance
Description: Physical Resistance increases by 45%.

Name: Physical Endurance
Description: Physical Resistance increases by 60%.

Name: Elemental Endurance
Description: Elemental Resistance increases by 30%.

Name: Elemental Endurance
Description: Elemental Resistance increases by 45%.

Name: Elemental Endurance
Description: Elemental Resistance increases by 60%.

Name: DMG Immunity
Description: Extra DMG Reduction increases by 30%.

Name: DMG Immunity III
Description: Extra DMG Reduction increases by 60%.

Name: Red Resistance
Description: Extra DMG Reduction against Red Orb skills increases by 100%.

Name: Blue Resistance
Description: Extra DMG Reduction against Blue Orb skills increases by 100%.

Name: Yellow Resistance
Description: Extra DMG Reduction against Yellow Orb skills increases by 100%.

Name: Sunder Armor
Description: Extra DMG Reduction decreases by 30%.

Name: Sunder Armor
Description: Extra DMG Reduction decreases by 45%.

Name: Sunder Armor
Description: Extra DMG Reduction decreases by 60%.

Name: Fatigue
Description: Extra DMG Bonus, Movement Speed, Attack Frequency, and Extra DMG Reduction decrease by 20%.

Name: Fatigue
Description: Extra DMG Bonus, Movement Speed, Attack Frequency, and Extra DMG Reduction decrease by 35%.

Name: Fatigue
Description: Extra DMG Bonus, Movement Speed, Attack Frequency, and Extra DMG Reduction decrease by 50%.

Name: Attack Reduction
Description: Extra DMG Bonus decreases by 30%.

Name: Attack Reduction
Description: Extra DMG Bonus decreases by 45%.

Name: Attack Reduction
Description: Extra DMG Bonus decreases by 60%.

Name: Hesitation
Description: Restores 5% Finisher Gauge per second after not taking damage for 8s.

Name: Dominator
Description: Immune to Matrix and limiting effects of Signature Moves.

Name: Bleed
Description: When the attack hits its target, the target loses 1% HP per second for 5s.

Name: Super Lightning Field
Description: Generate vertical and diagonal lightnings around the target every 8s in that order.

Name: Power of Nature
Description: Restores 1% HP per second. Summons a Fairy every 8s that rotates around you. When you have 3, releases all Fairies onto the target to deal damage and reduce max HP.

Name: Light
Description: Receives the power of lightning and gains [Repel Demons] in light environment.

Name: Darkness
Description: Receives the power of darkness to hide in the shadows and gains [Bleed] in dark environment.

Name: Security Captain
Description: Summons reinforcements periodically while the Security Captain is present.

Name: Alert
Description: DMG increases over time when there are enemies in the same area. The DMG bonus resets when there are no enemies in the same area.

Name: DMG+
Description: DMG is greatly increased for enemies under the red light.

Name: DMG Reduction+
Description: DMG Reduction is greatly increased for enemies under the yellow light.

Name: Elemental Edge
Description: Gains multiple elemental damage bonuses at the same time.

Name: Elemental Shield
Description: Gains multiple elemental resistance bonuses at the same time.

Name: Energize
Description: All units gain a DMG bonus based on HP percentage.

Name: Wind Zone
Description: Generates Wind Zones on the field. Units can gain a massive boost in Movement Speed while in the Wind Zones.

Name: Charge
Description: All units can cast skills immediately after moving to boost the damage based on Movement Speed.

Name: Alert
Description: Damage dealt by enemies in the same area as the character increases over time.

Name: Portal
Description: The character can use the Portal to switch between battle areas. Leaving an area through the Portal will reset the Alert of all enemies in the area.

Name: Carrousel
Description: The Carrousel rotates around the center of the field and never stops, dealing damage to those in its way.

Name: Meteor
Description: The Dragon periodically summons a meteor to fall upon the player.

Name: Falling Star
Description: The character periodically summons 5 meteors nearby to deal damage to all units within range.

Name: Bio-Bird
Description: The Bio-Bird lurks in the field and attacks those who approach.

Name: Scorch
Description: Attacks will also inflict Burn, dealing Fire DMG equal to 10% ATK every second to the target for 10s.

Name: Frost
Description: Attacks will also deal Ice DMG equal to 30% ATK and reduce the target's speed by 30% for 10s.

Name: Lightning Strike
Description: Attacks will also deal Lightning DMG equal to 30% ATK and reduce the target's ATK by 30% for 10s.

Name: Dark Corruption
Description: Attacks will also deal Dark DMG equal to 50% ATK and reduce the target's healing by 30% for 10s.

Name: Curse
Description: Permanently reduces the enemy's Extra DMG Reduction by 25% upon death.

Name: Deep-sea Bait
Description: Approach the mysterious fish to attract the true predator.

Name: Nightmare Phantom
Description: Getting close to an unknown phantom will trigger tentacles that hunt you, but it could also grant you bonus Signal Orbs.

Name: Heart of Bond
Description: Bosses will be linked. The character will take DMG over time in the area formed by the lines.

Name: Unreal Illusion
Description: Bosses will appear as phantoms and take 30% less DMG.

Name: Gaze of Nightmare
Description: Getting close to an unknown flash will force you to face the gaze of the abyss. You'll take damage, and your vision will be affected, but you'll also have a chance to get bonus Signal Orbs.

Name: Time Rift
Description: Getting close to a phantom will trigger the time rift. You'll lose Signature Energy over time when standing in it.

Name: Mental Crush
Description: Any Construct mentally controlled by Madorea will die directly.

Name: Corrupted Host
Description: Every 10s, the remaining Hetero-Consciousness Hosts on the battlefield will generate a Corrupted Construct (up to 10 at the same time).
